title: Intensive Remote Science English Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and foundational concepts in secondary-level science
context.additional_context: Hybrid approach combining real-time video classes and LMS (Learning Management System) assignments using digital devices, focusing on improving discipline-specific English proficiency for learners preparing for science-related careers

learning_goals: Students can write a 300-word scientific lab report using 20 required academic English expressions.
Students can deliver a 3-minute impromptu presentation on a science-related topic via a video conferencing platform.
Students can complete science terminology quizzes in the LMS with over 80% accuracy.

resources: English Language Textbooks for Science Subjects

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
